column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Our waiter was very very attentive
column3: I can't remember his name but he had a foreign accent. Â We placed our order
column4: and I told my boyfriend to get the Brussels sprouts because I wanted to try them
column5: but he opted into getting broccoli instead
column6: which was fine. I was a little bummed
column7: but got over it. After all
column8: I did have a whole rib eye coming with mashed potatoes :)
